page.title: 11THE STORAGE DEPOT-M.HADDON
page.content: THE STORAGE DEPOT HAS BEEN HERE FOR ABOUT 43 YEARS.IT WAS MADE TO STORE CARAVANS AND THINGS LIKE THAT.YOU CAN PUT YOUR CARAVAN IN THE DEPOT AND THEY WILL LOOK AFTER IT FOR YOU UNTIL YOU TAKE IT OUT TO GO ON HOLIDAY.THE MAXIMUM IS 200 CARAVANS.THE DEPOT ALSO STORES CARS.AT ONE TIME THERE WERE 7500 CARS.THERE HAVE BEEN CHANGES GOING ON.SOME OF THE STORES HAVE BEEN MADE INTO FREEZER FOR ICE-CREAM FOR THE ICE-CREAM VANS.40 PEOPLE INCLUDING SECURITY GUARDS WORK THERE.THE STRANGEST THING IS THE FIRST WHEEL BY JAMES WATT AND SOME VINTAGE CARS AND THINGS FOR THE BIRMINGHAM SCIENCE MUSEUM.
